javadoc:
Panel that shows the block comments; has radio buttons to choose
 which comment to use.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: listener
params.comment:
listener that is notified when a radio button is
 selected

methods.name: setComments
methods.comment: Set the comments so the user can resolve the conflict

params.name: latestComment
params.comment: comment from block in LATEST program

params.name: myComment
params.comment: comment from block in MY program

params.name: origComment
params.comment: comment from block in ORIGINAL program

name: CommentsConflictPanel
comment:
Panel that shows the block comments; has radio buttons to choose
 which comment to use.
